Posts.Content: Hi, I didn't have my Muga scan until after my first round of chemotherapy, although I had chemotherapy to shrink tumour before my surgery. Also I only had the one Mugs scan although I expected to have one mid way through and at the end but this never happened ,  no explanation why was ever given. I also think you shouldn't go back to work, good luck, chemotherapy is very do-able. xxx
Posts.Title: Fed up and need a rant

Posts.Content: Morning  Have you tried putting slices of lemon orange or lime in the water? I found Aldi’s flavoured water was my saviour and still drink at least a bottle of it a day now (finished treatment September 17). Hope you find something especially if you go on to have radiotherapy as drinking loads really does help prevent fatigue. Good luck Pam
